review_data.title: Fantastic own creation waffels and great coffee
review_data.content: We had delicious waffles here and great coffee before we headed off to the botanical gardens which are nearby. You can choose any sauce, fruit, sprinkles or icecream. All freshly made waffles in front of you- such a huge selection with plenty of fresh fruit...More
